definition: to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job

sentences.english: Consider the toothbrush’s head shape when selecting your tool of choice.
sentences.chinese: 在选择牙刷的时候要考虑到刷头的形状。

sentences.english: I'll send up a toothbrush right away.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一支牙刷和一支刮胡刀。

sentences.english: We everyday besides brush his teeth with tooth brush besides what cleanness tooth can you still use?
sentences.chinese: 我们每天除了用牙刷刷牙之外还能用什么清洁牙齿？

sentences.english: Sometimes the chimpanzees were given toys, such as magazines or toothbrushes.
sentences.chinese: 有时候他们会得到玩具，如杂志和牙刷。

sentences.english: Brillo foldable toothbrushes are designed for frequent travelers.
sentences.chinese: Brillo可折叠式牙刷专为经常旅行的人设计。

sentences.english: Recommending an usage to brush hair is softer, the toothbrush of top circle bluntness .
sentences.chinese: 推荐使用刷毛较软，顶端圆钝的牙刷。

sentences.english: Using either a circular or jiggling, up-and-down motion, brush this area with your toothbrush.
sentences.chinese: 牙刷以圆周或者上下簸动的方式来刷这块区域。

sentences.english: Do you prefer manual or battery toothbrush?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢普通还是电动牙刷？

sentences.english: I tried it and stabbed myself in the back of the throat.
sentences.chinese: 我试了，结果牙刷捅进了喉咙里。

sentences.english: I put my toothbrush in the mug.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的牙刷放在马克杯里。

sentences.english: The man in the picture has an odd little toothbrush moustache.
sentences.chinese: 画里的那个人留着一道古怪的牙刷似的小胡子。

sentences.english: I'd like a toothbrush and a razor.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一支牙刷和一支刮胡刀。

sentences.english: Teeth covered by an operculum can be difficult to clean with a toothbrush.
sentences.chinese: 被盲袋覆盖的牙齿很难用牙刷清理。

sentences.english: The bristles are 100% nylon and imported from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 牙刷毛100%用尼龙制作并且从日本进口。

sentences.english: Store and replace the head brush your teeth …Where the child brush all the requirements.
sentences.chinese: 商店和更换牙刷头刷在这里您的孩子牙齿的所有需求。

sentences.english: General people can as brush teeth as do other things by hand through the lingua-sleeve toothbrush.
sentences.chinese: 普通人使用舌套牙刷可边刷牙边用手做其他事务。

definition: variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
